headline: Democrats Assert Trump Was Trying to ‘Cheat’ in ’20 Bid
abstract: The House impeachment managers began presenting their oral arguments against President Trump in the Senate trial, arguing that his conduct warranted his removal.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The House Democratic impeachment managers began formal arguments in the Senate trial on Wednesday, presenting a meticulous and scathing case for convicting President Trump and removing him from office on charges of abuse of power and obstruction of Congress.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
